website_summaries.verdict: Very sturdy construction versus other mini cribs. Smartly folds down to small size for travel or storage.
pros: All-wood materials that meet ASTM safety standards
4 strong wheels on the legs of the crib provide stability
Assembly can be challenging, but crib provides a sturdy bed once you're finished
Nice option as a replacement for a bassinet
cons: You have to purchase the mattress separately

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. Its the perfect size for our shared Master/Nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! We have a small one bedroom apartment in LA and need to be smart about what we purchase for our baby. This crib is perfect. It was easy to put together, use, fold up and store. It's great that it's on wheels so it can move around from the bedroom to living room if needed to hold the baby while working. So far we are very happy with the quality and purchase.. no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Buscation

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful easily mobile piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little crib manovers easily in both folded and non folded forms. Changing the leveled for growing baby is easy however it is a little challenging to initially install. The mattress pad it comes with is basically useless but it was clearly labeled as 1 inch thick when we purchased it so we knew to buy another. It is avery pretty product a very attractive addition to any nursery. My only critasism is that with the wheels attached it is quite tall which makes it a little difficult to put baby in when on the lower setting especially if you are short like me (only 5'2)
customer_reviews.author: Beca Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for small space!
customer_reviews.text: This crib fit perfect for our small one bedroom granny flat. I was hesitant to order after reading a few negative reviews; but I had no problems with the crib materials no cracks, or chipping etc... it was also very easy to put together. I'd compare it to an IKEA furniture when it comes to assembling but even easier then that. There weren't that many pieces to have to put together and you only need an Allen wrench and screw driver. I did purchase a seprate mattress, the one it comes with is very thin. But overall great crib for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a few kids and many cribs. This mini crib on wheels is a game changer. Being able to wheel it through the doorways and around the house is amazing! We got this crib instead of a bassinet because we have a 20 month old that would pull over something smaller. She loves babies and thinks our new addition is hers. She has tried to climb this crib and it holds firm. So thankful to have something safe for baby.
customer_reviews.author: elle2947

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I told my husband to reserve 3 hours to assemble this bc of the negative reviews about assembly. He timed himself and was done in 40 minutes. He called it "cake" and said that whoever took 3 hours -nope, filter, I'll keep that between us. There was a light odor unpacking the pieces but nothing of concern, and it dissipated before he was done assembling it 😉. An even lesser odor has lingered a bit but gets better each day. It seems rather sturdy. I got the natural color version so there's no paint issues. No dings or issues with quality. My baby was nice and calm when we set her down in it (win)!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Almost every part of this product I received was damaged. To make it worse, I was also missing pieces. I sent correspondence to the manufacturer as requested in the product information material packaged with the product. I was very detailed and also provided pictures. I received a generic response that didn’t confirm what pieces were being sent to me as replacements. When I received the replacement parts, they were also damaged. Your better off purchasing the cheapest used product you could find off the internet or local flea market.
customer_reviews.author: Izabel Armas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size no matter size of room
customer_reviews.text: I (grandma) bought this cradle because of size and easy to move around. My daughter has a regular size baby bed. She saw mine and got one also. Affordable and perfect size no matter size of babies room. My daughter's hooked. So, her friends that are pregnant now are buying rather than regular size baby bed. After seeing the size, I think we will easily use it longer than expected
customer_reviews.author: Pam Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the natural wood color. Sturdy, and compact. Bought 2 for our twins, and both were in good condition and easy to assemble. Easy to fold and put away when mattress is removed. Very maneuverable with the wheels. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely. There was a small dent in the top part of the left side, but I was too impatient to complain and wait for a replacement. My husband will buff it out. Really easy to assemble and I like that I it's portable when necessary. We needed a space saver since currently the baby will be in the guest room. This crib has wheels, we just didn't put them on. It's definitely not the cheapest mini crib option, but it's sturdy-portable-and just about perfect for us. I also was able to use a standard crib sheet, with a mattress pad underneath and I upgraded the standard mattress, it's snug and doesn't allow for any sheet movement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crimella

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib! Not hard to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! The grey color is great, the size fits perfectly in my room. I read the reviews that people left with difficulty putting it together (it was very easy for me) and about the sides not locking (ours is perfectly safe and no issues there) and about it coming with scratches (ours came brand new without any dents or scratches). I love this crib, the way it looks, the wheels, the size, all in all I am very happy with my purchase! I'd buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: kkatrina18

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and small. 17 months and still working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib for my newborn son. He is 17 months and 33 inches long and still have room to grow. This crib is great quality, it is sturdy and looks good. I could not be happier with it
customer_reviews.author: Dri&Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love the crib
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib to have at my house for our granddaughter. I absolutely love it. Actually, our granddaughter sleeps better in this crib than her big one at her home! Also, I got the one with wheels, so I can roll the crib out on the porch during nice weather. V rly easy to move around. And I absolutely love the natural finish. My only complaint are the big stickers on the inside of each end of the crib. It too some work but with Goo Be Gone finally got all off.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H Decker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit scared after reading some reviews that I would end up with an ugly or cracked piece of wood or difficult hardware etc... or that it might take forever to build. My hubby built it really quickly and said it was one of the easier things to put together ...he said everything went really smoothly and it looks beautiful. He said I definitely needed to post a review because it's a really good piece of furniture !! I bought the white color and it's really cute. Glad I went with this over the $99 Delta mini Crib :)
customer_reviews.author: alexbrynna

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality and safe
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these and love them both. We can wheel the cribs throughout the house and can even take with us on trips. We feel secure and safe with our grandkids! It is hard to put together and time consuming and when folding up you have to have a screw driver handy to be able to fold it. We use it open mostly so it’s not to much of a burden. Would still recommend a way better mattress than the one it come with.. we upgraded😃
customer_reviews.author: Sara F.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are useless on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, once you figure out the ledges for the mattress support. Those should be labeled. The stickers are hard to take off and are an eyesore if left on. Wheels do not maneuver well on plush carpets.
customer_reviews.author: beautyscout

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is trash
customer_reviews.text: Love our crib, my only complaint is that after using it for only 1 year, the mattress cover tore (even with a sheet on) and the mattress is now completely falling apart (going in the garbage today). I feel this is unacceptable, even though I live everything else about the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: My baby is only 3 weeks old as I write this but so far I love the crib. It's much more space efficient than most cribs and I love that we can move it in and out of our room as needed. Plus it's really cute! I haven't needed to fold it up yet but I think I'll pass it down to Grandma for her to use with future grandbabies at her house and that'll be a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade mattress and casters!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product with exception of mattress and in particular the flimsy casters - hence 4 out of 5. Upgraded the mattress as another reviewer suggested and got these wheels which work wonderfully:  . If you’re buying this crib with the intention of moving it around frequently, do yourself a favor and upgrade the casters!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Barth

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I read that before buying
customer_reviews.text: **updated** UPDATED to add: the color does chip easily. Which is a dissappointment. 2017: Color is different than pictured here. More turquoise... I'm glad I read that before buying. Paint chips a little which is annoying but it's adorable and I get complements on it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as Pictured!💗
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this mini crib! So perfect for my husband and I’s bedroom that we are putting our baby girl in.... The crib comes out exactly how it was pictured and assembled easily with no issues! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Wheels snapped right off just after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Wheels snapped right off just after a year of use. Thank God my son was not injured when the cheap metal snapped! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Berardi

customer_reviews.title: Works on small area
customer_reviews.text: Nice small but won't work very long with a big baby because they get stuck sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Great space saving crib. Has two levels for the mattress. Mini crib mattresses are pricey compared to regular sized crib mattress. They also don't have as many sheet set options. BUT, they’re a great space saver and they look great once you put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice baby crib!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Our newborn has a ton of room and the crib does not take up a lot of space. We got the white colored crib because it matches everything. The assemble was simple. The crib parts were packaged very well. No damage. I was surprised. So far we only used this crib for about a week but I would give this crib a 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Nice little crib :)
customer_reviews.text: This crib is so cute! You need two people to assemble - but it’s pretty easy once you follow instructions! Fits a little corner in my bedroom. Looks pretty sturdy and minimalistic and stylish! Love it and love the color! (I got the green one!)
customer_reviews.author: Alina B-C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We wheel this throughout the house to warch our baby sleep...love it! It has 2 levels, so once he stands we will drop it down. Easy to travel with. Used a different mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Longfors

customer_reviews.title: This crib is beautiful. It is a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This crib is beautiful. It is a perfect size. We purchased a secure beginnings mattress and it fits perfectly. The color is great. The product did come with a small scratch but I imagine the baby will be leaving his marks shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, durable and great for a new born. I would prefer having a handy man around. I did it all by myself though. The sides where you can fold the crib was hard to handle because it keeps swinging back and forth. It did at one point pinched my fingers. Thankfully all pieces were there! Baby should be safe in the crib!
customer_reviews.author: Pa Yang

customer_reviews.title: Either a bad product or just bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple pieces came with chipped paint and 2 of the pieces had actual cracks in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini crib, its the perfect size for your bedroom rather than using a pack n play, which my baby did not like sleeping in. I like how you can add on the wheels or not, and it allows me to bring the crib anywhere in my house. I also bought mesh mini crib bumpers because my babies legs and arms kept getting caught in the slats, but other than that I really like this crib!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Crib
customer_reviews.text: Unisex color. A bit tough to get inner top saucer saped screews in. Chips a little too easy should come with touch up paint. Butso worth it for a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order open box
customer_reviews.text: Love crib but I ordered and open box crib. It was cracked so I wasn’t to happy about that but hey I just glued it and used clamps. Because I honestly didn’t feel like sending it back, to much for a 7 month pregnant woman to pack back up and ship back. So I’ll never order open box again.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cutest portable crib ever! We purchased this since our baby out grew her Co Sleeper crib, but we didn't want to put a full sized crib in our bedroom. (Hoping to move her into own room once she sleeps through the night better). Very easy to assemble, rolls really nicely and the grey is such a pretty gender neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.L

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: As of this moment, this is a fantastic item. It was easy to assemble and the little shelf inside the crib to store the mattress support is a genius idea. Item came in pristine condition (no scratches or breaks in the wood). Incredibly sturdy considering it is able to be stored folded.
customer_reviews.author: EDW

customer_reviews.title: So excited to use this crib!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect for our space! It took a while to put together, but it wasn't too difficult. So glad to have something portable, space-efficient, and stylish for my baby!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It arrived fast and built it the same day, took me about 1 hour on my own.. I didn’t add the wheels I like the way it looks without them.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Awful Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: While this crib is very cute, my son has not been able to use it yet as it smells like chemicals. It has been airing out for the past 2 days and the smell is still awful. It’s very cute and I found it easy to assemble, but that’s no use to me if I can’t use it. I’m hoping the odor goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: We love this crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib. Only problem is baby seems to already be growing out of it after 4 months. Our baby is on the tall side but read reviews saying it was good up to a year? Not in our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Scout

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. It fits perfectly in my smaller bedroom between the bed and wall. Great color and super convenient that it folds because it's right in front of my dresser.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mini crib for small space!
customer_reviews.text: If space for your nursery is your main concern, this is the crib for you! I love mine! The assembly was quick, the quality seems very strong, the wheels work smooth and overall it is a great purchase for the price. Really no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: perfect mini crib
customer_reviews.text: The most adorable mini. Instructions were super easy to ready and understand i was able to put together on my own ( MOM)
customer_reviews.author: Fif Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our bedroom for our daughter and we love it. It is small enough to fit in our small room and big enough to give her space to roll around and have a safe space to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: It has a strong smell
customer_reviews.text: We assembled the bed today and it looks quite nice and sturdy, however, it has a very strong smell, not too sure if it is toxic or not though, need to have the windows all open all day and night to see if it will get any better.,,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh T.

customer_reviews.title: This mini-crib is wonderful. Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: This mini-crib is wonderful. Solidly built, just the right size and it fits through doorways with ease. We have used it every day since the baby was 2 months old - he sleeps and rests quite well in this crib. One of my favorite purchases! We also bought the Babyletto sheets and they are soft and fit well. The prints are cuter in person than on the screen. One note, I did buy a Bloom Organic bumper and it was too short for this min-crib. The normal mini-crib materials all fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keys

customer_reviews.title: Newborns only
customer_reviews.text: Great crib for a newborn, my baby is five months and has grown out of this already, his feet hang out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: perfect small crib
customer_reviews.text: bought the mattress separate but the crib is cute, we have the pink one
customer_reviews.author: R Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. So easy to put to together and doesnt take up too much room but is the right size for our 5 month old! Would purchase again in the future for next baby
customer_reviews.author: Sherline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib, we wheel it to the bed and it’s a perfect size for our apt.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty easy between my partner and I. I love the quality of the crib. I do advise on getting a separate mattress, the one that comes with it is rather thin as you can see in the images I provided. It is very compact as well. Great for small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: VonnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed took me three hours to put together horrible
customer_reviews.text: Cute crib but it's a bi**** to put together one of the screws came out of the wood and I could never get it back in, so disappointed took me three hours to put together horrible experience
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great crib! Very maneuverable around the house
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! Very maneuverable around the house. Easy to move from room to room. Perfect for small apartments. One of the pieces had a defect when received, upon containing the manufacturer, the new piece was sent timely. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crib for the price. It looks nice and is compact
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look! Only Con-Wheels Not so Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this crib and the size is great as well. We're in a one bedroom on the east coast and needed something small/portable and this fits perfectly. Only con I would say, is we have wood floors and wheels don't roll very smoothly, and sometimes get stuck. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: AlexG89

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected and wanted. It is very sturdy and mostly rolls easily. It does have an issue on hardwoods, I think there is just not enough resistance to have the wheels turn properly all the time, but really satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Schweeres

customer_reviews.title: Manouverable safe sleep
customer_reviews.text: Really good to have in your living area for safe sleep. The included pad is more than fine for a newborn. Look at the other review for a fitted sheet - worked great for this and the pack and play
customer_reviews.author: Dave JR

customer_reviews.title: We love these mini cribs for our childcare center
customer_reviews.text: We love these mini cribs for our childcare center. Very functional for a room of crawlers and walkers. We will definitely order more for our expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Leadford

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received this beautiful crib today. Put it all together and noticed when I was putting the final touches on my grandson crib that it was damaged. Damaged enough that when he gets older it will be a problem.. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crib for small apt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect crib for small apt. So far big enough for my 8 month old, hoping to go all the way until 2 yrs old! Easy to set up & well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Piccolo

customer_reviews.title: Review for Amazon, not Babyletto
customer_reviews.text: Babyletto nor any other retailer would send it to Puerto Rico. Thanks Amazon !!! In love with the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great crib! Feels very sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great crib! Feels very sturdy and high quality! Sometimes we need to take it from one room to the other and the wheels work great.
customer_reviews.author: Gura

customer_reviews.title: This crib is great and very cute
customer_reviews.text: This crib is great and very cute. My only complaint is the hardware that came with it was a little frustrating. Some of the pieces didn't want to screw in correctly so it took a little more tinkering than i expected. But i did eventually get it together and am very happy with it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib! I put it together by myself at 30 weeks pregnant and did just fine. Very sturdy, lots of compliments on it, and have rolled it from our room to baby room on many occasions very easily. We bought a mattress from babyletto because the one it comes with is pretty flimsy. Our baby was born pretty big so we will see how long she lasts in it, but for now it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: New Mama

customer_reviews.title: In love with this crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Solidly built, the color is stunning. Folds up nicely for storage. Sized perfectly for use in our camper, too!
customer_reviews.author: SeldomIsHeard

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Crib for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: It’s a small enough crib to fit in my medium sized room. I can move it towards me at night with no problem. The color is soft and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Best small crib
customer_reviews.text: It is great compact yet very stylish and very study.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible crib!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a crib that was easy to transport and fit through doorways without disassembling. Crib is perfect! Assembly very simple, great directions, and pieces fit together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It's the perfect size and seems solidly built and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet alternative... Wish the mattress was better,
customer_reviews.text: Great crib which we use as a bassinet. Allows for moving the baby all over the house. The original mattress is way to thin (less than 1") and feels like plywood so we ended up purchasing a 3 " Babyletto matters as well which is much more comfortable. Some of the cam locks came stripped so we could not install the crib immediately. However the manufacturer promptly mailed a set of spate ones without any fuss or required proof of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Super cute crib
customer_reviews.text: Super cute crib. Mattress is really thin so for longevity you would have to buy a thicker one. Works just fine for a baby though
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib! Super simple to assemble. Excellent quality. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Usry

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive mini crib, perfect for small apartments. The wheels aren't the best quality but they get the job done well enough.
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my visiting grandson. It was easy to put together, came with a mattress, it worked out beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Super cute space saving crib
customer_reviews.text: Super cute space saving crib. Looks very nice and very good quality. The wheels makes it easier to move around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Sturdy and baby loves it. A bit hard to assemble and store.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy enough to put together. Great size and color. Now if they just made more bedding options for mini-cribs!
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small room
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! Perfect for a small room. Easy to assemble. Just like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: lourdes i. rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mini crib, did not take long at all to assemble. It looks elegant and just love it! Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mini crib is amazing. The finish is glossy soft and assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the crib
customer_reviews.text: love the crib fit well in the small space i have to work with, but the mattress that came with it was really thin so i had to buy a thicker for it that cost $100
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Iacovetta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Baby's not here yet to test it out but we love the look, size, quality and the wheels so it's movable in our small nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! Put it together by myself. Looks great and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib! I bought it because we are very limited on space and needed a small crib for our bedroom. It was super easy to put together. I had it done in 20 minutes. It feels very sturdy. We purchased the dream on me mattress and it fits perfectly. There is a slight smell, it smell like wood. No big deal. I do wonder if anyone has any tips on removing the warning labels in one piece. Overall it's a great purchase and I'm extremely satisfied. So is my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jade D.

customer_reviews.title: the paint chips pretty easily. it also wasn't as easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: the paint chips pretty easily. it also wasn't as easy to put together as i had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: alana martinez

customer_reviews.title: Paint peels off
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib really like it, but the paint started chipping off all around, it's brand new it should not be doing that
customer_reviews.author: hershy

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to assemble, just don't use the instructions(they can be very confusing). lowering rating due to the scratches/scuffs the crib has on the panels. you shouldn't be spending almost $300 for a product with scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but good things to say about this crib
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about this crib. We live in a small one bedroom apt that wouldn’t fit a full size crib but I still wanted to have a crib and not just a playard. This fits perfectly in our bedroom and at 7 months our very long baby still fits great.... and he has slept in this crib every night since home from the hospital. We didn’t use the mattress pad the crib comes with but bought a Little One’s mattress pad which fits nicely under the mini crib sheets and adds a little cushioning while protecting the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cute crib.... but lacks in quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute crib....but lacks in quality of materials. 2 of the screws were broken and my hisband had to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: mahsa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is the perfect size for small bedroom .. Baby is 4 months and has plenty of room to grow in
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I can say the recipient was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I have not see the crib "in person". It was a gift sent to another state. I can say the recipient was very pleased with it, and can't wait till they have the "soon to be coming baby in it!
customer_reviews.author: Laundry Lady

customer_reviews.title: I really LOVE it. Its perfect size for our small space
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE it. Its perfect size for our small space. Its very adorable and stylish. I gave four stars because my only concern is its kind of small. My almost eight months old still sleeps in it, I am worried about buying another which is what we cannot afford. My son is pretty tall but we will see how far he goes with it. Besides thats its so cute and I got so many compliments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crib because it's compact and modern looking and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great crib because it's compact and modern looking and all natural BUT sadly the paint chips off the grey one. That can't be safe :/
customer_reviews.author: KYOD

customer_reviews.title: Well made and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: We are expecting our first baby and live in an450 sq ft cabin so space is paramount! This little crib which is advertised to fit babies up to 18 months is the perfect size. It was easy to assemble...probably took me and my mom 30 minutes. Left the wheels off so it doesn’t sit higher than my window ceil and you can see the holes where the wheels are meant to go but that doesn’t really bug me. My dad took a look and was really pleased saying it was a sturdy and well made crib. Excited to see our little girl in it soon!
customer_reviews.author: SunshineCO

customer_reviews.title: So perfect! I love this crib for our first baby
customer_reviews.text: So perfect! I love this crib for our first baby. The bottom can be raised so when baby starts walking he can't climb out. My husband put it together and said it wasn't super easy but not very hard either. The mattress it came with isn't much, so we got another one to go with it. The compact size is nice and I love the grey.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Eikel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect size if you are space conscious (or it you need it)! We love everything about it except you have to be really careful when putting it together. We have some color come off at the corners! But all in all its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib!
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! Love the color! Exactly what I expected. My husband said it was a cinch to put together. We did let it air out in the garage for a few days before assembly because other reviewers had mentioned a strong odor, but once it aired out and was assembled the odor is almost non-existent. It is small enough to fit in our master bedroom as we are limited on space. I can't wait to see our baby sleep in it in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Claire L Covert

customer_reviews.title: Love these cribs
customer_reviews.text: Love these cribs. I have twins and needed a set of smaller cribs for the babies. These are perfect. Easy to put together and they take up a lot less room in the nursery. I would highly recommend if you have multiples or a small nursery space.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but order a different mattress
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had baby in the crib just yet but excellent quality and fairly easy to assemble. You will need to order a mattress. I had no use for the mattress that came with the crib - too thin and not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: It seems like someone thought they could save a few pennies ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent an hour assembling the crib - relatively straightforward and par for the course. I have since spent another 1.5 hours trying to remove the large and ugly product stickers plastered all over the crib. Even with GooGone this has been an ordeal. It seems like someone thought they could save a few pennies ordering cheaper stickers, but these things are 95% adhesive and 5% tissue-thin paper that is impossible to peel off. Now that I'm done ranting, the crib itself seems nice and sturdy. It looks attractive and was easy enough to assemble. The casters are a nice feature. If you buy this crib, also buy a bottle of GooGone.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, fits perfect in our bedroom. Love the look, clean lines and modern. Way better than using a pack n play
customer_reviews.author: Chefbytrade

product_meta.title: Babyletto Origami Mini Portable Crib with Wheels in Grey, 2 Adjustable Mattress Positions, Greenguard Gold Certified
product_meta.description: Color:Grey| Style:CribMeet Origami Mini, the portable mini crib designed for modern families. Perfect for urban living or alternative care spaces, The Origami Mini's petite footprint and rolling feet allow for easy movement throughout the home, and will outlast a bassinet, providing a safe sleeping environment for your growing babe, from newborn to beyond 18 months. With a folding mechanism for storage, The all-wood slat construction of the Origami Mini is both durable and lightweight.
feature_bullets: URBAN STYLE AND SIZE: Designed for urban living with a foldable frame and removable locking caster wheels for easy storage and transport. It's a smart and stylish alternative to a bassinet, suitable for a growing babe from newborn to beyond 18 months

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Origami has been tested for over 10,000 chemicals and passes the most stringent emission standards. It contributes to clean indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow

ADJUSTABLE MATTRESS HEIGHT: The low-profile design lets you easily put a newborn to rest and 2 adjustable mattress positions adapt to the baby's growth. This crib includes a 1" mattress pad. Mattress Size: 37.6" x 23.5"
SUSTAINABLE DESIGN: Made with sustainably sourced solid New Zealand pine wood, one of the most renewable woods available. The mattress support is TSCA compliant engineered wood

SAFE FOR BABE: We go the extra step to ensure your babe's safety. Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting and staining process that is lead and phthalate safe which exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars307 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
